start.annotation: Since there's no help, come let us kiss and part

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain r06_line r07_phr

LMNL.text: Since there's no help,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain r06_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain r06_line r08_phr

LMNL.text: come let us kiss and part,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain r09_line r10_phr

LMNL.text: Nay I have done,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain r09_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain r09_line r11_phr

LMNL.text: you get no more of me;

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain r12_line r13_phr

LMNL.text: And I am glad,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain r12_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain r12_line r14_phr

LMNL.text: yea,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain r12_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain r12_line r15_phr

LMNL.text: glad with all my heart,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain r16_line r17_phr

LMNL.text: That thus so cleanly I myself can free;

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r18_quatrain r19_line r20_phr

LMNL.text: Shake hands for ever,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r18_quatrain r19_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r18_quatrain r19_line r21_phr

LMNL.text: cancel all our vows,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r18_quatrain
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r18_quatrain r22_line r23_phr

LMNL.text: And when we meet at any time again,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r18_quatrain
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r18_quatrain r24_phr r25_line

LMNL.text: Be it not seen in either of our brows

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r18_quatrain r24_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r18_quatrain r24_phr r26_line

LMNL.text: That we one lot of former love retain.

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r28_s r29_quatrain r30_line r31_phr

LMNL.text: Now at the last gasp of love's latest breath,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r28_s r29_quatrain
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r28_s r29_quatrain r32_line r33_phr

LMNL.text: When his pulse failing,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r28_s r29_quatrain r32_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r28_s r29_quatrain r32_line r34_phr

LMNL.text: passion speechless lies,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r28_s r29_quatrain
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r28_s r29_quatrain r35_line r36_phr

LMNL.text: When faith is kneeling by his bed of death,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r28_s r29_quatrain
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r28_s r29_quatrain r37_line r38_phr

LMNL.text: And innocence is closing up his eyes,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r28_s
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r28_s r39_couplet r40_line r41_phr

LMNL.text: â€” Now if thou would'st,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r28_s r39_couplet r40_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r28_s r39_couplet r40_line r42_phr

LMNL.text: when all have given him over,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r28_s r39_couplet
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r28_s r39_couplet r43_line r44_phr

LMNL.text: From death to life thou might'st him yet recover!
